overview:
Dale W. Strang ist the former executive vice president and general manager of the media division at IGN Entertainment. .

Strang has more than 18 years of experience in consumer, technology and video game publishing, including 14 years at the senior management level. Strang went to IGN after eight years at Ziff Davis Media, where he most recently served as CEO and senior vice president of the game group. During his tenure at Ziff Davis, Strang oversaw several new product launches and acquisition activities and led his group to record levels in market share, revenue and profit.
